message.content:
cs.OS, cs.AR, cs.SY, cs.DC, cs.PL 

The paper discusses the performance impact of page remappings in modern operating systems, which is a topic related to operating systems (cs.OS) and computer architecture (cs.AR). The proposed solution, HATRIC, is a hardware mechanism, which falls under the category of computer systems and networking (cs.SY). The paper also discusses the implementation of HATRIC using KVM-based virtualization, which is related to distributed, parallel, and cluster computing (cs.DC). Finally, the paper mentions the use of Xen, which is a hypervisor, and thus related to programming languages and compilers (cs.PL).
